connection

Class Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • connection.Connection

  • public class Connection
extends java.lang.Object
    Wraps the connection tot the front-end to simplify sending messages.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Connection(org.java_websocket.WebSocket socket)
      The constructor for the Connection object.

      • sendEnd

        public void sendEnd()
        Send a message to the client that the game session has ended. So the player goes from the end screen to the menu screen.

      • sendSpawnWave

        public void sendSpawnWave(int amount,
                          int health,
                          int speed,
                          int spawnTime,
                          float[] preWeights,
                          float[] postWeights,
                          float[] sparkTypePercentages)
        Send a message to the client about what to send in the wave.
        Parameters:
        amount - Amount of the sparks that spawn.
        health - Health of the sparks that spawn.
        speed - Speed of the sparks that spawn.
        spawnTime - Time between spawning enemies.
        preWeights - Float array with weights of spark types for the pre path.
        postWeights - Float array with weights of spark types for the post path.
        sparkTypePercentages - Float array of percentages of special spark types to spawn.
